question: 飲酒
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Drink</kanji> <kanji>alcohol</kanji> is <vocabulary>drinking alcohol</vocabulary>, or just <vocabulary>drinking</vocabulary>. This always refers to alcohol though.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You haven't learned this reading of <ja>飲</ja> yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

Where's a good place for <vocabulary>drinking alcohol</vocabulary>? An <reading>inn</reading> (<ja>いん</ja>), of course!
